Client.Name: Wuxi Ruisi Cultural Technology Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Wuxi Ruisi Foreign Language Training Co., Ltd. was established on June 5, 2013 and was formerly affiliated with Ruisi Education Group. The company was originally a foreign-funded enterprise, mainly providing foreign language training and subject English education services for young people aged 4-12. The curriculum adopts multimedia interactive teaching courseware used in multiple states in the United States. On January 5, 2022, the company was renamed Wuxi Ruisi Cultural Technology Co., Ltd., and its business scope expanded to diversified training fields such as language proficiency, art, sports, and technology. As of 2023, the company has a staff size of 74 and has a branch, Wuxi Ruisi Foreign Language Training Co., Ltd. Binhu Branch
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
A number of language education materials, mostly videos, in many languages around the world.

We'd like to see him preserved in perpetuity.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
Our company has staff who have specialized in understanding and testing the Filecoin project. According to their description, they will use Singularity as an open source tool for data generation, which they have already tested

Here's the documentation for it
https://github.com/tech-greedy/singularity/blob/main/getting-started.md
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America
